title: Thousands Of Ukrainians To Graduate Amid "To Stay Or Leave" Concerns
content: Dozens of teachers and professors have been fighting on the front lines and one-fifth of the sector's facilities have been damaged or destroyed by Russian bombardments
summary: Dozens of teachers and professors have been fighting on the front lines and one-fifth of the sector's facilities have been damaged or destroyed by Russian bombardments

title: Can Bayer Weedkiller Cause Blood Cancer? What Australian Court Said
content: An Australian judge on Thursday dismissed a class action lawsuit claiming Bayer's Roundup weedkiller can cause a type of blood cancer, a boost for the company which is grappling with a slew of similar cases in the United States.
summary: An Australian judge on Thursday dismissed a class action lawsuit claiming Bayer's Roundup weedkiller can cause a type of blood cancer, a boost for the company which is grappling with a slew of similar cases in the United States.

title: UK Police Officer Filmed Stomping On Man's Head At Airport, Probe Launched
content: Disturbing videos showing a British police officer kicking and stomping on a man's head at Manchester Airport on Tuesday night have sparked outrage on social media.
summary: Disturbing videos showing a British police officer kicking and stomping on a man's head at Manchester Airport on Tuesday night have sparked outrage on social media.

title: Schools Shut, Flights Cancelled As Typhoon Gaemi Brings Rain In Philippines
content: Heavy rain from Typhoon Gaemi has flooded the Philippine capital Manila and nearby cities, forcing authorities to shut schools, and offices and cancel flights on Wednesday and declare a state of calamity in a region that is home to 13 million people.
summary: Heavy rain from Typhoon Gaemi has flooded the Philippine capital Manila and nearby cities, forcing authorities to shut schools, and offices and cancel flights on Wednesday and declare a state of calamity in a region that is home to 13 million people.

title: France Announces Major Operation To Fight Cyber-Spying Ahead Of Olympics
content: Investigators were targeting a network of bots suspected of infecting computers with PlugX malware and of stealing data from them "notably for purposes of espionage.
summary: Investigators were targeting a network of bots suspected of infecting computers with PlugX malware and of stealing data from them "notably for purposes of espionage.

title: Germany's Busiest Airport Resume Operations After Climate Activist Protest
content: Frankfurt airport, Germany's busiest, has resumed operations after suspending flights on Thursday morning when several climate activists blocked runways by gluing themselves to the tarmac.
summary: Frankfurt airport, Germany's busiest, has resumed operations after suspending flights on Thursday morning when several climate activists blocked runways by gluing themselves to the tarmac.

title: Russian Mi-28 Military Helicopter Crashes Due To Malfunction, Crew Dead
content: An Mi-28 military helicopter crashed in an uninhabited area of southwestern Russia, killing the crew, two Russian news agencies said Thursday.
summary: An Mi-28 military helicopter crashed in an uninhabited area of southwestern Russia, killing the crew, two Russian news agencies said Thursday.

title: Group That Backed Nikki Hailey Over Donald Trump Now Supports Kamala Harris
content: The group has raised nearly $400,000 from anti-Trump groups and encourages former Haley supporters to vote for Harris.
summary: The group has raised nearly $400,000 from anti-Trump groups and encourages former Haley supporters to vote for Harris.

title: Opinion: Kamala Harris, The Woman Left To Clean Up Joe Biden's Mess
content: Choosing Kamala Harris over Joe Biden is a tactical course-correction for Democrats, but it may have come a bit too late. Her strengths may not get optimised, her weaknesses are for all to see.
summary: Choosing Kamala Harris over Joe Biden is a tactical course-correction for Democrats, but it may have come a bit too late. Her strengths may not get optimised, her weaknesses are for all to see.

title: Australia Sanctions Israel Settlers Accused Of Assault Of Palestinians
content: Australia on Thursday followed Europe and the United States by levying sanctions on Israeli settlers accused of "beatings, sexual assault and torture" of Palestinians in the occupied West Bank.
summary: Australia on Thursday followed Europe and the United States by levying sanctions on Israeli settlers accused of "beatings, sexual assault and torture" of Palestinians in the occupied West Bank.

title: Israel Army Recovers Bodies Of 5 Hostages Held In Gaza
content: Israeli forces retrieved the bodies of five people taken hostage into the Gaza Strip during Hamas's October 7 attack on southern Israel, the military said Thursday.
summary: Israeli forces retrieved the bodies of five people taken hostage into the Gaza Strip during Hamas's October 7 attack on southern Israel, the military said Thursday.

title: Starlink Now Operational On More Than 1,000 Aircraft: Elon Musk
content: The affordable internet service Starlink is now operational on more than 1,000 aircraft, SpaceX and Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on Thursday.
summary: The affordable internet service Starlink is now operational on more than 1,000 aircraft, SpaceX and Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on Thursday.

title: Philippine Tanker Carrying 1.4 Million Litres Of Oil Capsizes In Manila Bay
content: A Philippine-flagged tanker carrying 1.4 million litres of industrial fuel oil capsized and sank off Manila on Thursday, authorities said, as they raced against time to contain the spill.
summary: A Philippine-flagged tanker carrying 1.4 million litres of industrial fuel oil capsized and sank off Manila on Thursday, authorities said, as they raced against time to contain the spill.

title: Report Reveals Why Barack Obama Hasn't Endorsed Kamala Harris In US Polls
content: Many Democratic leaders have backed Kamala Harris as the party's new US Presidential candidate, but ex-president Barack Obama has held off so far.
summary: Many Democratic leaders have backed Kamala Harris as the party's new US Presidential candidate, but ex-president Barack Obama has held off so far.

title: Obama Praises Biden's "Lifetime Of Service" Following Oval Office Address
content: Former US President Barack Obama commended President Joe Biden's dedication to the nation in light of Joe Biden's recent Oval Office address, marking a pivotal moment in American politics.

title: Explained: Why Paris 2024 Will Be The Most High-Risk Olympics In History
content: The Paris Olympic Games will be one of the most high-risk in history owing to a combination of internal strife within France and heightened global geopolitical tensions.
summary: The Paris Olympic Games will be one of the most high-risk in history owing to a combination of internal strife within France and heightened global geopolitical tensions.

title: US, Canada Intercept China, Russia Planes Near Alaska
content: American and Canadian warplanes intercepted two Russian and two Chinese bombers in international airspace near the state of Alaska on Wednesday, the joint US-Canadian North American Aerospace Defense Command (NORAD) said.
summary: American and Canadian warplanes intercepted two Russian and two Chinese bombers in international airspace near the state of Alaska on Wednesday, the joint US-Canadian North American Aerospace Defense Command (NORAD) said.

title: "Russia's Most Beautiful Biker" Dies In Motorbike Crash In Turkey
content: A bike ride took a deadly turn for a 38-year-old Russian social media influencer in Turkey after she crashed into a truck while riding her red BMW motorcycle.
summary: A bike ride took a deadly turn for a 38-year-old Russian social media influencer in Turkey after she crashed into a truck while riding her red BMW motorcycle.

title: US Lawmaker Hold Ups "War Criminal" Sign During Netanyahu's Congress Speech

title: What Donald Trump Said On Joe Biden's First Speech After Exiting US Polls
content: Joe Biden made his first televised address today since quitting the 2024 US presidential elections earlier this week.
